Photographs: Passport size photographs of the applicant and co-applicant (if any).
Identity Proof: Any one of the following:, Passport, Aadhaar , Voter ID , Driving license
Guarantor Form: If required, duly filled and signed.
Academic Records: Mark sheets and certificates of qualifying exams., Admission letter.
Income Proof: For salaried individuals: Salary slips of the last 3 months, Form 16, and/or Income Tax Returns (ITR), For self-employed individuals: ITR, Profit & Loss account, Balance Sheet, and/or Business Proof
Property Documents: If applicable as collateral, documents related to the property being pledged.
Residence Proof: Any one of the following:, Passport, Aadhaar , Voter ID , Driving license
Bank Statements: For the last 6 months (both applicant and co-applicant).
